_**User (2025-12-09 21:43Z)**_

The preview uses `formatDateToMMYY` on line 278, which only shows month and year. Updating it to use `formatDateToFull` to show the full date.


---

```diff
+ import { formatDateToFull } from '@/lib/dateUtils';
  
  // Prevent static generation since this page uses Supabase
```

---


Updated the date display in the upload contacts preview. Changes:

1. **Updated the import** on line 6: changed from `formatDateToMMYY` to `formatDateToFull`
2. **Updated the date display** on line 278: changed from `formatDateToMMYY(contact.dateAdded)` to `formatDateToFull(contact.dateAdded)`

The preview records window on the upload contracts page now shows the full date (MM/DD/YYYY) instead of only month and year. The `formatDateToFull` function is already in your `dateUtils.ts` file and formats dates as MM/DD/YYYY.

No linting errors. The change is ready to use.
